name: EnviroMetal
description:
Robots have taken over nature! Envirometal is a 2D action platformer where you have to fight back against the robots and save nature. 

Game created by: 

  • Dalton Williams
  • Patrick Caldwell
  • David Gipson
  • Shea Murphy
  • Kevin Kotleba
  • Jess Kasper
  • Jack Sampson
  • Flagalstan
